channel.title: acoustics on Massimiliano Canzi
channel.description: Recent content in acoustics on Massimiliano Canzi

item.title: [Canzi, M.] Inter- and intra- speaker variation of F(0, 1, 2) & vowel duration in soft, neutral and loud speech in Italian.
item.description: Conferences Canzi, M. (2018) The Forensic implications of comparing soft, neutral and loud speech. Talk presented at the Manchester Forum in Linguistics (mFiL) at The University of Manchester Canzi, M (2018) A quantitative analysis of inter- and intra- speaker variation of F0, F1, F2 and vowel duration in soft, neutral and loud speech in Italian. Poster presented at the British Association of Academics in Phonetics (BAAP) at the University of Kent.
